name: Doge: To the Moon!
description:
In "Doge: To the Moon!" the player must help their shibe collect enough dogecoins to get to the moon! Wow!

As your shibe flaps through the graphics cards they'll collect dogecoins that allow them to buy new hats! Much style!

You can flap past your wallet to boost your multiplier, but the game will become more difficult, and you risk losing everything! If you fall into your wallet at the end of a round, your dogecoins will be saved!

"Doge: To the Moon!" was developed in GameMaker within 72 hours for a game jam at my university. The theme of the jam was "Risk". Please feel free to send me feedback or follow me on Twitter!
